text: Irina Georgieva Bokova (; born 12 July 1952) is a Bulgarian politician. She was the Director-General of UNESCO from 2009 until 2017. She was a member of the National parliament. She also was Bulgaria's ambassador to France and to Monaco. She was elected a honorary member of the Academia Europaea in 2010. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:United Nations officials Category:Politicians from Sofia Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Irina Bokova
